creator: heinz.vanpee@gmx.de
jsalvata@atg.com
text:
This one is awful, but essentially cosmetic - the message to human is incorrect,
but the assertion's behaviour is still correct.

Downgrading to minor severity.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
This bug was fixed in version 1.12 of ResponseAssertion (the notMessage and 
failMessage fields were removed, so there are now no instance fields to clone).
